Class BresenhamLOS

    public class BresenhamLOS
extends java.lang.Object
implements LOSSolver
    A Bresenham-based line-of-sight algorithm.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - eben@squidpony.com

                  int targetX,
                  int targetY,
                  float force,
                  float decay,
                  RadiusStrategy radiusStrategy)
        Description copied from interface: LOSSolver
        Returns true if a line can be drawn from the start point to the target point without intervening obstructions.
        Specified by:
        isReachable in interface LOSSolver
        Parameters:
        map - marks the level of resistance the the line per cell
        force - the amount of impetus to start with
        decay - the amount the force is reduced per unit distance
        radiusStrategy - the strategy to use in computing unit distance
        Returns:

      • isReachable

        public boolean isReachable(float[][] resistanceMap,
                  int startx,
                  int starty,
                  int targetx,
                  int targety)
        Description copied from interface: LOSSolver
        Returns true if a line can be drawn from the start point to the target point without intervening obstructions. Does not take into account resistance less than opaque or distance cost. Uses the implementation's default RadiusStrategy.
        Specified by:
        isReachable in interface LOSSolver
        Returns:
